ai-patthana8.1:1.1_0: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
ai-patthana8.1:2.1_0: For the sake of teaching doesn’t arise because of the aggregates, three elements, or four aggregates, or five sense fields. ...
ai-patthana8.1:2.1_1: Two on the aggregates from form,
ai-patthana8.1:2.1_3: (All shouldn’t cause the reason for the sake of painful feeling.)
ai-patthana8.1:2.1_5: causes and reason for the sake of thought, not for the sake of cause or reason.
ai-patthana8.1:3.1_0: Not knowing the principle for the sake of thought, not for the sake of cause.
ai-patthana8.1:3.1_1: Not knowing the principle for the sake of principle.
ai-patthana8.1:3.1_2: doesn’t arise because of cause or reason.
ai-patthana8.1:4.1_0: Not because of the cause or condition for the sake of principle,
ai-patthana8.1:4.1_1: Nor does she give rise to thought.
ai-patthana8.1:4.1_2: Not because of cause or reason, they don’t arise for the sake of cause or reason.
ai-patthana8.1:6.1_0: (This should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana8.1:7.1_0: No cause is the reason for this.
ai-patthana8.1:7.1_1: nor for the sake of cause or reason.
ai-patthana8.1:7.1_2: Nor do they cause a reason for the sake of listening to the teaching.
ai-patthana8.1:8.1_0: for the sake of principle, not for the sake of the Teaching.
ai-patthana8.1:8.1_1: For the sake of principle, not for the sake of the Teaching.
ai-patthana8.1:8.1_2: For the sake of principle, nor for the sake of the teaching.
ai-patthana8.1:9.1_0: for the sake of principle, not for the sake of the Teaching.
ai-patthana8.1:9.1_1: For the reason for not giving a teaching.
ai-patthana8.1:9.1_2: For the sake of principle, nor for the sake of the teaching.
ai-patthana8.1:10.1_0: nor for the sake of deference to the teaching.
ai-patthana8.1:10.1_1: Nor do they aim for the sake of deceived by the teaching.
ai-patthana8.1:10.1_2: Nor do they for the sake of deference to the teaching, or for the sake of principle.
ai-patthana8.1:11.1_1: before and after the meal, he says:
ai-patthana8.1:11.1_6: (This should be expanded in detail as in the chapter.)
